00037 /* Buffer copies directions */
00038 #define COMEDI_BUF_PUT 1
00039 #define COMEDI_BUF_GET 2
00040 
00041 /* Events bits */
00042 #define COMEDI_BUF_EOBUF_NR 0
00043 #define COMEDI_BUF_ERROR_NR 1
00044 #define COMEDI_BUF_EOA_NR 2
00045 /* Events flags */
00046 #define COMEDI_BUF_EOBUF (1 << COMEDI_BUF_EOBUF_NR)
00047 #define COMEDI_BUF_ERROR (1 << COMEDI_BUF_ERROR_NR)
00048 #define COMEDI_BUF_EOA (1 << COMEDI_BUF_EOA_NR)
00049 
00050 struct comedi_device;

00052 /* Buffer descriptor structure */
00053 struct comedi_buffer {
00054 
00055         /* Buffer's first virtual page pointer */
00056         void *buf;
00057 
00058         /* Buffer's global size */
00059         unsigned long size;
00060         /* Tab containing buffer's pages pointers */
00061         unsigned long *pg_list;
00062 
00063         /* RT/NRT synchronization element */
00064         comedi_sync_t sync;
00065 
00066         /* Counters needed for transfer */
00067         unsigned long end_count;
00068         unsigned long prd_count;
00069         unsigned long cns_count;
00070         unsigned long tmp_count;
00071 
00072         /* Events occuring during transfer */
00073         unsigned long evt_flags;
00074 
00075         /* Command on progress */
00076         comedi_cmd_t *cur_cmd;
00077 
00078         /* Munge counter */
00079         unsigned long mng_count;
00080 };
00081 typedef struct comedi_buffer comedi_buf_t;

00083 /* Static inline Buffer related functions */

00085 /* Produce memcpy function */
00086 static inline int __produce(comedi_cxt_t * cxt,
00087                             comedi_buf_t * buf, void *pin, unsigned long count)
00088 {
00089         unsigned long start_ptr = (buf->prd_count % buf->size);
00090         unsigned long tmp_cnt = count;
00091         int ret = 0;
00092 
00093         while (ret == 0 && tmp_cnt != 0) {
00094                 /* Checks the data copy can be performed contiguously */
00095                 unsigned long blk_size = (start_ptr + tmp_cnt > buf->size) ?
00096                     buf->size - start_ptr : tmp_cnt;
00097 
00098                 /* Performs the copy */
00099                 if (cxt == NULL)
00100                         memcpy(buf->buf + start_ptr, pin, blk_size);
00101                 else
00102                         ret = comedi_copy_from_user(cxt,
00103                                                     buf->buf + start_ptr,
00104                                                     pin, blk_size);
00105 
00106                 /* Updates pointers/counts */
00107                 pin += blk_size;
00108                 tmp_cnt -= blk_size;
00109                 start_ptr = 0;
00110         }
00111 
00112         return ret;
00113 }
00114 
00115 /* Consume memcpy function */
00116 static inline int __consume(comedi_cxt_t * cxt,
00117                             comedi_buf_t * buf, void *pout, unsigned long count)
00118 {
00119         unsigned long start_ptr = (buf->cns_count % buf->size);
00120         unsigned long tmp_cnt = count;
00121         int ret = 0;
00122 
00123         while (ret == 0 && tmp_cnt != 0) {
00124                 /* Checks the data copy can be performed contiguously */
00125                 unsigned long blk_size = (start_ptr + tmp_cnt > buf->size) ?
00126                     buf->size - start_ptr : tmp_cnt;
00127 
00128                 /* Performs the copy */
00129                 if (cxt == NULL)
00130                         memcpy(pout, buf->buf + start_ptr, blk_size);
00131                 else
00132                         ret = comedi_copy_to_user(cxt,
00133                                                   pout,
00134                                                   buf->buf + start_ptr,
00135                                                   blk_size);
00136 
00137                 /* Updates pointers/counts */
00138                 pout += blk_size;
00139                 tmp_cnt -= blk_size;
00140                 start_ptr = 0;
00141         }
00142 
00143         return ret;
00144 }
00145 
00146 /* Munge procedure */
00147 static inline void __munge(comedi_cxt_t * cxt,
00148                            void (*munge) (comedi_cxt_t *, int, void *,
00149                                           unsigned long), int idx_subd,
00150                            comedi_buf_t * buf, unsigned long count)
00151 {
00152         unsigned long start_ptr = (buf->mng_count % buf->size);
00153         unsigned long tmp_cnt = count;
00154 
00155         while (tmp_cnt != 0) {
00156                 /* Checks the data copy can be performed contiguously */
00157                 unsigned long blk_size = (start_ptr + tmp_cnt > buf->size) ?
00158                     buf->size - start_ptr : tmp_cnt;
00159 
00160                 /* Performs the munge operation */
00161                 munge(cxt, idx_subd, buf->buf + start_ptr, blk_size);
00162 
00163                 /* Updates the start pointer and the count */
00164                 tmp_cnt -= blk_size;
00165                 start_ptr = 0;
00166         }
00167 }
00168 
00169 /* Event consumption function */
00170 static inline int __handle_event(comedi_buf_t * buf)
00171 {
00172         int ret = 0;
00173 
00174         /* The event "End of acquisition" must not be cleaned
00175            before the complete flush of the buffer */
00176         if (test_bit(COMEDI_BUF_EOA_NR, &buf->evt_flags)) {
00177                 ret = -ENOENT;
00178         }
00179 
00180         if (test_bit(COMEDI_BUF_ERROR_NR, &buf->evt_flags)) {
00181                 ret = -EPIPE;
00182         }
00183 
00184         return ret;
00185 }
00186 
00187 /* Counters management functions */
00188 
00189 static inline int __pre_abs_put(comedi_buf_t * buf, unsigned long count)
00190 {
00191         if (count - buf->tmp_count > buf->size) {
00192                 set_bit(COMEDI_BUF_ERROR_NR, &buf->evt_flags);
00193                 return -EPIPE;
00194         }
00195 
00196         buf->tmp_count = buf->cns_count;
00197 
00198         return 0;
00199 }
00200 
00201 static inline int __pre_put(comedi_buf_t * buf, unsigned long count)
00202 {
00203         return __pre_abs_put(buf, buf->tmp_count + count);
00204 }
00205 
00206 static inline int __pre_abs_get(comedi_buf_t * buf, unsigned long count)
00207 {
00208         if (!(buf->tmp_count == 0 && buf->cns_count == 0) &&
00209             (long)(count - buf->tmp_count) > 0) {
00210                 set_bit(COMEDI_BUF_ERROR_NR, &buf->evt_flags);
00211                 return -EPIPE;
00212         }
00213 
00214         buf->tmp_count = buf->prd_count;
00215 
00216         return 0;
00217 }
00218 
00219 static inline int __pre_get(comedi_buf_t * buf, unsigned long count)
00220 {
00221         return __pre_abs_get(buf, buf->tmp_count + count);
00222 }
00223 
00224 static inline int __abs_put(comedi_buf_t * buf, unsigned long count)
00225 {
00226         unsigned long old = buf->prd_count;
00227 
00228         if (buf->prd_count >= count)
00229                 return -EINVAL;
00230 
00231         buf->prd_count = count;
00232 
00233         if ((old / buf->size) != (count / buf->size))
00234                 set_bit(COMEDI_BUF_EOBUF_NR, &buf->evt_flags);
00235 
00236         if (count >= buf->end_count)
00237                 set_bit(COMEDI_BUF_EOA_NR, &buf->evt_flags);
00238 
00239         return 0;
00240 }
00241 
00242 static inline int __put(comedi_buf_t * buf, unsigned long count)
00243 {
00244         return __abs_put(buf, buf->prd_count + count);
00245 }
00246 
00247 static inline int __abs_get(comedi_buf_t * buf, unsigned long count)
00248 {
00249         unsigned long old = buf->cns_count;
00250 
00251         if (buf->cns_count >= count)
00252                 return -EINVAL;
00253 
00254         buf->cns_count = count;
00255 
00256         if ((old / buf->size) != count / buf->size)
00257                 set_bit(COMEDI_BUF_EOBUF_NR, &buf->evt_flags);
00258 
00259         if (count >= buf->end_count)
00260                 set_bit(COMEDI_BUF_EOA_NR, &buf->evt_flags);
00261 
00262         return 0;
00263 }
00264 
00265 static inline int __get(comedi_buf_t * buf, unsigned long count)
00266 {
00267         return __abs_get(buf, buf->cns_count + count);
00268 }
00269 
00270 static inline unsigned long __count_to_put(comedi_buf_t * buf)
00271 {
00272         unsigned long ret;
00273 
00274         if (buf->size + buf->cns_count > buf->prd_count)
00275                 ret = buf->size + buf->cns_count - buf->prd_count;
00276         else
00277                 ret = 0;
00278 
00279         return ret;
00280 }
00281 
00282 static inline unsigned long __count_to_get(comedi_buf_t * buf)
00283 {
00284         unsigned long ret;
00285 
00286         if (buf->end_count != 0 && (buf->end_count > buf->prd_count))
00287                 ret = buf->prd_count;
00288         else
00289                 ret = buf->end_count;
00290 
00291         if (ret > buf->cns_count)
00292                 ret -= buf->cns_count;
00293         else
00294                 ret = 0;
00295 
00296         return ret;
00297 }
